articleContent: Sonntagmorgen bemerkte die Besitzerin Cornalia Wallern, dass Springs aus dem Gehege in ihrem Garten entwischt ist und begann sofort nach mit der Suche. Wie es das KÃ¤nguru geschafft hat, aus dem Gehege zu entwischen, weiÃŸ Wallner nicht.

articleContentTranslated: On Sunday morning, the owner Cornalia Wallern noticed that Springs had escaped from the enclosure in her garden and immediately started looking for it. Wallner doesn't know how the kangaroo managed to escape from the enclosure.

He must have escaped through the fence. The kangaroo has been sighted several times in the Oberwart district, most recently in Pinkafeld. Photo gallery with 2 pictures Don't try to catch the animal yourself Springs is very shy, which is why no attempts should be made to catch the animal.

"If the kangaroo is spotted, it is best to let us know right away, we will get in the car immediately and come, because Springs is used to us," said Wallner in an interview with ORF Burgenland. Springs is one of two male kangaroos that the Wallner family keep as pets.

Cornelia Wallner hopes that Springs will be found again quickly. â—â—Please, please ğŸ™ shareâ€¼ ï¸â€¼ ï¸ Our kangaroo boy "Springs" from Oberwart has escaped from his enclosure since Sunday morning .... Posted by Cornelia Wallner on Wednesday, December 23, 2020
